SA15bsa0554u:6: prīṇantyeva vi + + + + hi śiśoḥ prāyaḥ pitṛṇāṃ manaḥ //
SA15bsa0554u:11: sa cānubhavāvasito 'sati bādhake pratyakṣasidvo hetorāśrayāsidviṃ nihanti /
SA15bsa0554u:12: nanu bhavadbhirasannevāvayavī pratijñāyate sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:13: nāvayavinamiha dharmmiṇaṃ pratipannāḥ smaḥ kintu pratibhāsamānasthūla nīlādikamartham /
SA15bsa0554u:14: na tarhi virudvadharmmasaṃsargādavayavina ekatvaṃ niṣidvaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:28: na paramāṇusañcayavādināṃ sthūlākāraḥ kaścidartho 'sti yaḥ prasidvo dharmmī syāditi /
SA15bsa0554u:29: avayavyanabhyupagame 'pi hi niravayavānekātmakaḥ sthūlo 'rthobhyupagamyamānaḥ kena niṣidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:30: syānmataṃ niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣe sthūlenā kāreṇāvabhāseran,
SA15bsa0554u:33: paramāṇava eva hi pararūpadeśaparihāreṇotpannāḥ parasparasahitā avabhāsamānā deśavitānavanto bhāsante /
SA15bsa0554u:35: yattuktaṃ sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodha iti tat kiṃ pararūpadeśaparihāravatī niravayavānāmutpattiḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:38: ataeva niravayaveṣu bahuṣvekasmin vijñāne pratibhāsa māneṣu bhavan pratibhāsakālabhāvī pratibhāsadharmmaḥ sthūlākāro na tu vāstavaḥ pratyekamabhāvāt /
SA15bsa0554u:39: pratibhāsāt prāgūrdvaṃ vā na tarhi sthūlo 'rtha iti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:40: na tadāpi pratibhāsayogyatāsambhavāt yadaiva hi sañcitā bhaveyustadaiva pratibhāsayogyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:46: tadayaṃ nirantara eka eva sthalo niravayavānekātmako bhavitumarhati,
SA15bsa0554u:57: tatrāpi kimeṣāmantaraṃ vivekaḥ pararūpaśūnyatā veti cintyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:60: nanu ca na pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sthūlākāraḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:62: yathā ca nīlaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasambhavan pītākāro bahuṣvapi na dṛśyate /
SA15bsa0554u:63: tathā pratyekamasambhavan sthūlākāraḥ kathaṃ bahuṣu syāditi /
SA15bsa0554u:66: tataḥ pītavirudvaṃ nīlākāraṃ vibhrāṇeṣu bahuṣvapi kathaṃ pītākāro bhavet /
SA15bsa0554u:68: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ sthūlo 'rtha iha dharmmīti vyavasthitaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:69: tadevamavasthite dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ vā nirūpyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:70: tatra pāṇyādāvekasmin kampamāne sthūlo 'rthaḥ sakampaniḥkampe rūpe yugapat pratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ virudvadharmmasaṃsargavānna syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:74: iha ca sakampaniḥkampe rūpe gṛhṇat pratyakṣameva sāmarthyāt parasparābhāvaṃ sādhayati /
SA15bsa0554u:76: syādetat pāṇyādāvekasminnavayave kampamāne nāvayavinaḥ kampa rūpamabhyupeyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:77: avayava eva hi tadā kriyāvān dṛśyate /
SA15bsa0554u:80: yathā rathe calati tadā rūḍho 'pi calatīti /
SA15bsa0554u:86: yadā tu śarīrakampanārthaḥ prayatnaviśeṣa ātmano jāyate /
SA15bsa0554u:88: ato bhinnamiti tayorekasmin jāte kathaṃ nimittāntarapratibadvajanmā tadabhāve tadaparo 'pi tathaiva jāyeta /
SA15bsa0554u:89: ratha tadārūḍhakarmmaṇostu satyapi nimittabhede nimittayaugapadyāt sahabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:92: tayośca sahabhāvāt karmmaṇī api yaugapadyena jāyete /
SA15bsa0554u:97: tena ca saṃyoge 'samavāyikāraṇe nivarttate nivarttetāvayavi dravyamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:106: anyathāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭebhya ākāśadeśebhyo vibhāgo 'vayavāsaṃsṛṣṭeśca saṃyogovayavinaḥ kriyāvataḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:114: tasmādavayavini kriyāvati avayavāḥ kriyāvanta ityakāmakairapi vaiśeṣikairidamabhyupeyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:115: yathā cāvayavikriyāyāmavayavāḥ kriyāvanta stathāvayaveṣvapi kriyāvatsu tadavayavaiḥ kriyāvadbhirbhāvyamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:116: anayā diśā dvyaṇuke kriyāvati tadārambhakau paramāṇūkriyāvantau mantavyau /
SA15bsa0554u:121: ekasya paramāṇoḥ kriyā na parasyeti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:124: evañca bdyaṇukadravyasya kriyāvattve tryaṇuke 'pi kriyā syādityanena krameṇa paridṛśyamāno 'calaścalaḥ syādavayavaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:128: sāvayavo hi bhāva ekenāvayavena vastvantarasaṃyukta evāvayavāntarai ścalaiḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:132: tathāhyāvṛte ekasmin pāṇyādau sthūlasyārthasyāvṛtānāvṛte rūpe yugapadbhavantī virudvadharmmadvayasaṃyogamasyāvedayataḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:143: na cārdvāvaraṇe bhūyasāmavayavānāmastīndriyasannikarṣaḥ tato na sthūlagrahaṇamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:149: atha sthūlatvākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo guṇaḥ sa drabyādanya eveti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:156: yadyevaṃ sa eva tarhyavayavaḥ svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratyakṣostvāvaraṇakālenāvayavī /
SA15bsa0554u:159: yasya hi mahato 'vayavasya tata parimāṇaṃ sa tāvat svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa0554u:160: avayavinaśca tatparimāṇasambadvapratibhāsābhyupagame dvayoḥ samaparimāṇayorayavāyavavinoḥ pratibhāsa āsajyate /
SA15bsa0554u:163: syādetadyasyāvayavasya parimāṇenāvayavī sambadvaḥ pratibhāti sa svaṃ parimāṇaṃ parityajyābhātīti /
SA15bsa0554u:166: na ca bādhakamantareṇa bhrāntirapi śakyā vyavasthāpayitum /
SA15bsa0554u:169: paramadhyāvarttināmavayavānāmindriyasannikarṣābhāve sthūlatamāvayavidarśanānupapatteḥ syānmataṃ nikhilā vayavadarśanaṃ na sthūlapratyakṣakāraṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:173: tato na yāvanniravaśeṣāvayavadarśanaṃ tāvat kathaṃ sthūlatamārthapratipattiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:176: krameṇa diśāmavayavānāṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe pratyakṣaḥ sthūlo 'vayavīti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:177: anyadā tu kaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti vimṛṣyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:179: avayavī api paramadhyavarttino na yugapaddṛśyanta iti kathaṃ so 'pi pratyakṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:180: tadevaṃ nāvayavī nāvayavāḥ pratyakṣā iti na kiñcidṛśyeteti /
SA15bsa0554u:183: tathā hyekasminnukte sthulo 'rtho raktārakte rūpe yugapat pratipadyamāno virudvarūpadvayayogamātmanaḥ prakāśayati /
SA15bsa0554u:184: nanva vayava eva rakto 'vayavī tvaraktaikarūpa eveti /
SA15bsa0554u:188: avayavasya ca rāgadravyeṇa saṃyoge 'vayavino 'pi tena bhāvyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:189: avaśyaṃ hi kāraṇasaṃyoginā kāryyamapi saṃyujyata iti samayāt /
SA15bsa0554u:191: asti hi kuṅkumārakte paṭāvayave kuṅkumāraktaḥ paṭa iti pratyayaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:192: tato rāgadravyasaṃyukta evāvayavīti tasyāpi varṇāntarānavabhāsaḥ syādavayavinaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:193: rāgadravyaṃ hi pratyāsīdat nijarūpaṃ vastuna stirodhatte svena ca rūpeṇa dravyaṃ sambandhati /
SA15bsa0554u:194: yathā raktovayavastirohitasahajarūpo rāgadravyasamavāyinā rūpeṇa sambandhī pratibhāti /
SA15bsa0554u:202: yadi hi svāśraye samaveto rūpādivat vyāpyavṛttirevāyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:208: abhāvo hi bhāvanivṛttirūpo nāsya bhāvanivṛttiṃ hitvā rūpāntaramīkṣate /
SA15bsa0554u:209: yaśca yannivṛttirūpaḥ sa kathaṃ tasmin satyeva bhavati /
SA15bsa0554u:211: tathā hyanalaṃ paśyannapi salilārthī tatra pravartteta /
SA15bsa0554u:215: nanu tatra yadi jalaṃ syādupalabhyeta kimataḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:223: tatra bhāvanivṛttirūpe 'bhāve sidve kathaṃ bhāvopalabdhirna bhrāntā syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:227: rūparasayostu na parasparanivṛttī rūpamiti kathaṃ tadudāharaṇamiha śobheta /
SA15bsa0554u:236: iha tāvadekasmin deśe paricchidyamāne tādrūpyapracyutirasya vyavacchidyate /
SA15bsa0554u:239: yadi hi paricchidyamāno deśāntarasvabhāvo bhavettadā tadrūpa evopalabdho bhavet /
SA15bsa0554u:240: deśāntararūpantu virahayya svena rūpeṇa prakāśamāno deśo deśāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityavasīyate /
SA15bsa0554u:241: yathā ca deśasya deśāntarāsaṃsargastathā tenādhārabhūtena deśena yadyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadapi deśāntarasaṃsargādavicchinnaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa0554u:242: kathaṃ hi tena deśena vyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadabhāvavati deśāntare vartteta /
SA15bsa0554u:243: yathā ekena deśena vyāpto ghaṭo na deśāntare varttate /
SA15bsa0554u:247: yaduta ekadeśavyāptaṃ rūpaṃ na deśāntare varttate iti /
SA15bsa0554u:249: tadabhāvavati deśāntare varttamāno 'pi tena deśena vyāpyeta /
SA15bsa0554u:256: tathāhi bhāvābhāvāveva parasparaparihāreṇa virudvau na vastunī /
SA15bsa0554u:258: tena yadeva vastu vastvantarapracyutimat tadeva tena virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:261: ekakāryyanirvarttanaśaktimati ca rūpe gṛhyamāṇe kāryyāntara nirvarttanaśaktirapi paricchidyata iti /
SA15bsa0554u:264: yathātyanta sadṛśorvastunoryugapadupalabhyamānayoḥ satyapi cākārabhede dūrādanupalakṣyamāṇabhedayordeśabhedamātranimittakaṃ pratyakṣāvasitaṃ virodhamāśritya bhedo 'vasthāpyate /
SA15bsa0554u:266: yathaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhinneṣu cakṣurādiṣu varttate tadadhīnotpādatayā /
SA15bsa0554u:268: so 'pi deśabhedanimitte virodhe 'vasthāpyamāne vastunaḥ kāraṇabhedanimittaṃviro dhamāsañjayan na naipuṇyamātmano nivedayati /
SA15bsa0554u:279: tadevaṃ kamparāgāvaraṇabhāvābhāvakṛte deśabhedanibandhane ca caturthe virudvadharmmasaṃsarge 'vayaviviṣaye vyavasthāpite pakṣadharmmatvaṃ sidvaṃ hetoḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:284: tato virudvadharmmasaṃsarge 'pi bhavannabhedavyavahāro vyāpakaṃ nimittavattvaṃ jahyāt /
SA15bsa0554u:288: evaṃ prasādhite 'syāstrairūpye 'sidvavirudvānaikāntikā doṣā nāvakāśaṃ labhante / iti //
SA15bsa0554u:289: evaṃ mayā bahuṣu durmmatinirmmiteṣu pratyudvṛteṣu khalu dūṣaṇakaṇṭakeṣu /
